name: The Prisoner (Jay Kozatt, JohnPaul1617)
description:
The Prisoner is a horror story in which you awake within a prison and are forced to play a game of trust and betrayal with another inmate in order to decide who stays and who leaves.

______________________________

Made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.

Credits:

Character Design by John Bone

Music by Ram99

Game design & Programming by Jay Kozatt

Rushed Sound Design also... by Jay Kozatt

Cover art by Craiyon.com

Made with Unity, FMOD Studio and Inkle's Ink narrative language.
